title: The app needs a lot of work
text: I use my phone to play audio books while I work around the house but the app only allows for music to be played through the speakers (that which is on the phone or through paid services). Not a big deal if you wanted to just hard wire the phone to the speaker, but I want the phone to be playing on multiple speakers as I work in different areas (which requires the app).  Overall the concept is good (multiple wireless speakers playing different things or all the same thing), but the app is lacking a few things to consider.

title: This App is the life blood
text: The equipment must be run by this app to be effective. Sure you can hard wire your iPod, computer, or phone into one speaker but that's it. If you want to take advantage of the multiple speaker option, the app is necessary, and the app needs a lot of help. I am constantly restarting the app for it to find my speakers and yesterday had to delete the app and reinstall. This app is the life blood of the system and it is only a 1 star. The theory of it is a 4 star, (some things should be better, see above reviews), but currently it needs a lot of help.

title: Few fixes and it'll be 5 stars
text: Take away the limit for playlists. I want to be able to shuffle my library but I have over 500 songs. Also let us change songs from the lock screen and change the volume outside the app with the side buttons on iPhone.

title: Lost connection
text: The connection gets lost. No soundstage device found is constantly displayed, even after connecting to it in the past. App needs fixing fast. Although hardware is good, thinking of returning my unit.
